name: Super Yoyo Cannibal Tower BC
description:
Made in 48 hours for the 48 Secret Game Jam

"Here at Anarchy Studios, we try to make our games with high degrees of realism. We have dug deep into ancient historic lore, studied the physics of yoyo's and..."

Okay, fine, it's a game where you beat people up with yoyos and eat their heads on a quest for ancient knowledge. How much more epic can you get?

The themes were "Ancient Knowledge", "Unconventional Weapons",  "Cannibalism", and "Tower"

If you get stuck in a wall, press R to restart!
